txt.en: 'It may still stand, but the watch-tower is lost. We must fall back!'
'What you have done this day will not go unanswered.'
Follow me!'
'We must hold the gate!'
'To me... I beg you...'
'It is as we feared—the Enemy walks among his servants at last.'
'Nothing shall remain of this city but dust!'
'Hearken to me, warriors! This day we stand in defiance of Sauron himself!'
'We shall cast the Enemy from our city once and for all!'
'We'll take your pretty little city apart stone by stone!'
'Bolster the front! Caras Gelebren must not fall!'
'Hold back the Orcs! Do not allow them one step further into our city!'
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter: Harsh laughter erupts from within the dome in the centre of Caras Gelebren...</rgb>
'Will your blood stain the earth for as long as one of your wretched lives?'
'Pray that it does or all that you were will be forgotten!'
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter Complete: Gháshmog has fallen to your mighty blow!</rgb>
'Your time is over! The doom of Eregion is at hand!'
'The Enemy shall not triumph! Glory to the Mírdain!'
'To arms!'
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter: A mocking roar echoes from the watch-tower of Caras Gelebren...</rgb>
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter: The sounding of a horn echoes from the southern gates of Caras Gelebren...</rgb>
<rgb=#FF0000>Enemies are marching on the south gate of Caras Gelebren!</rgb>
First Assault
'The Enemy's forces return... and in greater numbers!'
'Celebrimbor!'
'Even now, you refuse to see my master's wisdom.'
'Prepare yourselves! One of Sauron's champions approaches!'
'You fear only what you do not yet understand.'
'Ha... haha...'
'What he offers would be a boon to us all!'
'See you this ring upon my finger?'
'It is Narchuil, the Ring of Truth.'
'Trust now that I do not speak falsehoods.'
'If you surrender the Rings of Power, there will again be peace in Eregion.'
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter Complete: Thordrok falls to your mighty blow!</rgb>
'I, Mátshakha, swear this to you, Lord Celebrimbor.'
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter Complete: Urzrúk has fallen to your mighty blow!</rgb>
'Hold fast, my friends!'
'No! I go on! In every flame! In every last ember!'
'The fires of Udûn burn within me!'
<rgb=#FF0000>Enemies are marching on the north and south gates of Caras Gelebren!</rgb>
'Darkness shall smother you!'
'Horror awaits you...'
'Burn to ash!'
'We must prevent them from breaching the gates!'
'Hahaha!'
'Perish in flame!'
'Lay down your weapons!'
Second Assault
'Die!'
'Enough blood has been spilled.'
'Do not forget this mercy, Amarthiel.'
'If ever you dare to return, I will not spare you again.'
'Begone!'
'If but for a moment, the Enemy's assault is broken.'
Watch-tower
'I fear we shall not have long to rest!'
'The Enemy's forces are at the north gate!'
<rgb=#FF0000>Enemies are marching on the House of the Mírdain!</rgb>
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter Complete: Irutrákri falls to your mighty blow!</rgb>
'Let us fall back to just within the gates!'
'I'll tear you apart!'
House of the Mírdain
'The gate-walls shall hinder the advance of the Enemy!'
'When at last your will is broken, you will surrender the Rings of Power.'
'Hold fast!'
'Limb from limb!'
'I am all that awaits you, Celebrimbor.'
'All is lost, Celebrimbor.'
'There will be nothing left to return to, Celebrimbor.'
'Tremble before me!'
'To my side, maggots!'
'But with your aid, I may yet find what I seek.'
'Yours is the mercy of a fool.'
'Bleed!'
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter: A deafening screech pierces the air near the southern walls of Caras Gelebren...</rgb>
'That you might look upon the face of a friend one last time, Celebrimbor.'
'Bleed and die!'
'It matters not.'
'I have wrought an army greater than any in this world since the age of Morgoth.'
'The Valar have abandoned you.'
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter Complete: Khorgol falls to your mighty blow!</rgb>
'Do you not see?'
'All of your triumphs and all of your failures were of my design.'
'Do not speak to me of shame, Celebrimbor!'
'Your city will be unmade and your people slain to the last.'
'It was you who welcomed Antheron into Eregion.'
'No matter the guise in which he cloaks himself, Sauron shall never possess what he seeks.'
'You who let him walk among your people that you might flourish under his tutelage.'
'This I swear... to my last breath!'
'It was not Antheron who deceived you, but you yourself!'
'You alone bear the guilt of what is to come!'
'Die, fool!'
'You have failed!'
'None... of your kind... shall escape...'
Fourth Assault
Doom of Caras Gelebren
'So be it!'
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter: The earth itself shudders as a great beast approaches Caras Gelebren...</rgb>
'Here they come!'
'None may defy my master and live!'
'The Enemy has ceased his attack once more!'
'You must go! Flee by secret ways, lead the others north, and do not look back!'
'Tend to your wounds, but remain vigilant!'
'I will bathe in the blood of the Elves!'
'The battle is far from over!'
'So weak...'
'Long have you toiled to preserve your legacy, but it is for naught.'
<rgb=#FF0000>Enemies are marching on the watch-tower of Caras Gelebren!</rgb>
North Gate
'All of your works shall crumble to ashes!'
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter Complete: Margzal falls to your mighty blow!</rgb>
'The Rings... will... be ours...'
Fifth Assault
'Sauron teaches that Men--not Elves--are the chosen of the gods!'
'The armies of the Enemy are too vast!'
'You live a hundred lives, fear no illness, and still you covet more?!'
'Do not despair, my kin! We shall repel the Enemy!'
'The forces of the Enemy are on the march!'
Third Assault
'A-ha-ha!'
'It's the end of days for you lot!'
South Gate
'We have earned a brief respite, but it won't be long before they resume the attack.'
'Ahahahaha!'
'The Enemy's forces have renewed their assault!'
'Kneel before me!'
'Our foes press the attack!'
'Feel the fire of Narchuil!'
'The forces of the Enemy return!'
'Let doubt seize your heart!'
'Let us hope that our allies shall soon reach the city!'
<rgb=#FF0000>A Champion of the Enemy has joined the battle!</rgb>
'Embrace me, Narchuil!'
'Lord Celebrimbor is right! He and the others must ready our defences within the walls if we are to survive this siege!'
'I call you to my side, servants!'
<rgb=#FF0000>Enemies are marching on the north gate of Caras Gelebren!</rgb>
'Let us hold the watch-tower and delay the Enemy for as long as we can!'
'Obey!'
'Let us hope that Gil-galad and the others shall soon arrive or all will be lost!'
'Death to the Elves!'
Amarthiel[fn]
'The Enemy's forces march on both gates!'
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter Complete: Urush-kharga falls to your mighty blow!</rgb>
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter: A shadow passes over the stables of Caras Gelebren...</rgb>
'You speak of peace as you bear witness to our doom.'
'A better student your master could not find.'
<rgb=#FF0000>You have borne witness to the doom of Caras Gelebren</rgb>
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter: Screams echo from the northern gates of Caras Gelebren...</rgb>
'And that name you call yourself...'
'It is of the dark tongue of Mordor--of the Enemy.'
'Its mere utterance in my presence is an affront!'
Final Assault
'Nay, I brand you: Amarthiel!'
'Yet here, even on the cusp of victory, you conceal your face behind that mask.'
'Could it be the faintest glimmer of shame, or is there truly so little left of who you once were?'
'Heed my words, Amarthiel.'
'The Rings are ours by right!'
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter Complete: Gurrákhal falls to your mighty blow!</rgb>
'I require aid!'
'We have stood fast in the face of the Enemy, but this respite will not last.'
'Let us hope that word has reached Gil-galad or all shall be lost!'
'You!'
'Go and aid our warriors at the south gate!'
'You need not guise yourself in a fair form any longer, Sauron.'
'Why still do you wear the face of Antheron?'
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter: A spine-chilling howl echoes from the northern walls of Caras Gelebren...</rgb>
'All of the Elves make war against you.'
